QuestData.Title: Burning Sky
QuestData.Description: It happened so fast. A white-hot flash of light ignited the nearby woods, followed by terrible winds that swept the flames across Aruuna.$B$BMoments later, arakkoa began descending through the smoke.$B$BI need to get Melani to the Pilgrim's Road. From there we can head for Anchorite's Sojourn and the protection of the vindicators. With the arakkoa roaming the area freely, I fear we'll be run down or worse: taken by the spreading wildfires.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa Adherent Invaders in Aruuna and the Aruuna Crystal Mine.
QuestData.RewardText: Their deaths will not bring back Aruuna, but it does give me comfort to know that some among us can stand against them.
